name: Evstigney Afinogenovich Mirovich
description: Russian and Belarusian Soviet actor, director, playwright, teacher, professor (1945). People's Artist of the Byelorussian SSR (1940). One of the founders of the Belarusian theater art and the Belarusian Yanka Kupala Theater

mapData.title: Belarusian State Academic Theater of the Young Spectator

bio.description: He was born on August the 10th, 1878 in St. Petersburg, Russian Empire
He began his professional stage work in St. Petersburg as an actor and director. Played in the Admiralty, Ekaterininsky, Kronstadt theaters
He became a member of the St. Petersburg Union of Dramatic and Musical Writers
He was the artistic director of the 1st Belarusian State Drama Theater in Minsk (now the Yanka Kupala National Academic Theater)
He was the artistic director of the Gomel Theater of Working Youth, which in 1935 he reorganized into the first collective-state-farm theater in the republic
He was the artistic director of the Belarusian Theater for Young Spectators named after N. Krupskaya
He was the director of the 1st Byelorussian State Drama Theater in Minsk (now the Yanka Kupala National Academic Theater)
He was artistic director and head of the department of actor's skill at the Belarusian Theater and Art Institute
